    Bridges

    dApps to bridge assets between different rollups and Ethereum, or between different layer 1 chains.



    Ethereum <–> Rollups/Sidechains

    • Optimism gateway
    • Arbitrum bridge
    • Hop Protocol
    • zkSync wallet
    • Metis bridge
    • Boba gateway
    • zk.money (Aztec)
    • Hermez wallet (Polygon Hermez)
    • Teleportr
    • Polygon bridge
    • Omnibridge (Gnosis chain)
    • xDai bridge (Gnosis chain) (Only for DAI <–> xDai)

    Serving multiple chains/rollups

    Note the risks of cross-chain bridges.

    • Dfyn Network
    • xPollinate
    • Synapse protocol
    • Across.to
    • Celer Bridge
    • Connext
    • Layerswap
    • Multichain
